backend/main.mo: Motoko backend implementing user profiles, access control, and full CRUD operations for publishers with permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing required frontend changes related to showing publisher data in the Territories table.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing roles of various frontend files including pages, hooks, and components.
frontend/.env: Environment variable file defining the Internet Identity provider URL.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base configuration defining theme variables, colors, and dark mode styles.
frontend/index.html: Simple HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main routing setup for all pages including authentication gating and layout rendering.
frontend/src/components/conductors/Condu: Modal form for creating and editing trained conductors, loading publishers and submitting mutations.
frontend/src/components/conductors/Delet: Confirmation dialog that deletes a conductor using a mutation and shows a loading state.
frontend/src/components/fieldService/Del: Dialog to confirm deletion of a group visit, calling a mutation and showing toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/fieldService/Gro: Displays a group visit’s date, topics, attendees, and notes with optional edit/delete actions.
frontend/src/components/fieldService/Rec: Form modal for creating or editing a group visit with validation and timestamp conversion.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout with sidebar, header, routed content, and global toasts.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header with menu toggle and logout functionality that clears identity and cache.
frontend/src/components/layout/Sidebar.t: Collapsible navigation sidebar listing app routes with mobile overlay support.
frontend/src/components/notes/AddGlobalN: Modal for creating or editing global notes, including category selection and optional publisher attachment.
frontend/src/components/notes/GlobalNote: Displays a note card with title, category badge, optional attached publisher, content preview, creation date, and edit/delete actions.
frontend/src/components/pioneers/AddPion: Modal for adding monthly pioneer hours, validating input and submitting via mutation before closing.
Modal to create a pioneer by selecting an active publisher and service year, submitting via mutation with success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/pioneers/Current: Badge component showing pioneer status (loading, no entries, on track, behind) based on average monthly hours.
frontend/src/components/pioneers/DeleteP: Confirmation dialog to delete a pioneer record, triggering a mutation and showing success/error toasts.
Dialog to delete a specific month's pioneer hours, calling a mutation and showing a loading state during deletion.
frontend/src/components/pioneers/EditPio: Modal for editing an existing hours record, pre-filling current value and updating it via mutation.
Modal for editing pioneer details, allowing publisher and service year changes and submitting updates with validation and toasts.
frontend/src/components/pioneers/Pioneer: Displays total hours, service year average, and a status badge for a pioneer.
Renders a table row showing a pioneer's details, calculated hours, status badge, and action buttons.
frontend/src/components/publicWitnessing: Confirmation dialog to delete a trained publisher using a mutation hook.
Modal for creating or editing a trained publisher with form fields and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/publishers/AddPu: Modal to add a new publisher with validation, mutation submission, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/publishers/EditP: Modal to edit publisher details, mapping privileges and submitting updates via mutation.
frontend/src/components/shepherding/Edit: Modal to edit a shepherding visit with validation, timestamp conversion, and update mutation.
frontend/src/components/shepherding/Reco: Modal form for recording a shepherding visit, including validation, date conversion, and API submission.
frontend/src/components/tasks/AddTaskMod: Modal for creating a new task with required field validation, date conversion, and task submission.
frontend/src/components/tasks/EditTaskMo: Modal for editing an existing task, initializing form fields from the task and submitting updates via API.
frontend/src/components/territories/AddT: Modal for adding a new territory with basic validation and API creation.
frontend/src/components/territories/Chec: Table displaying sorted territory checkout history with optional edit and delete actions.
Modal to check out a territory to a publisher, supporting campaign flagging and API submission.
frontend/src/components/territories/Dele: Confirmation dialog that deletes a checkout record via mutation and shows success or error toasts.
Dialog to confirm and execute deletion of a territory note, with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/territories/Edit: Modal for editing a checkout record, handling publisher selection, date fields, validation, and update mutation.
Modal for editing a territory’s number and type with validation and update mutation.
Modal that edits an existing territory note’s content and saves updates via mutation.
frontend/src/components/territories/Terr: Card displaying a territory note with formatted date and edit/delete buttons.
Section for creating, listing, editing, and deleting territory notes with sorting and modals.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAddPublisher.ts: Mutation hook to add a publisher, mapping UI privileges to backend format and invalidating publisher queries.
frontend/src/hooks/usePioneerHours.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch, add, update, and delete pioneer monthly hours with cache invalidation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/usePioneers.ts: Defines hooks to fetch all pioneers or a single pioneer using actor-backed queries.
frontend/src/hooks/usePioneersOnTrack.ts: Calculates how many pioneers meet the 50‑hour monthly average by aggregating service year hours via actor queries.
frontend/src/hooks/usePublisherNotes.ts: Empty placeholder file for publisher notes hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exposes hooks for fetching all publishers or a specific publisher from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useServiceMeetingCond: Fetches all service meeting conductor assignments through a simple React Query hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useShepherdingVisit.t: Hooks to fetch, update, update notes, and delete a single shepherding visit with appropriate cache updates.
Provides a hook to retrieve all shepherding visits from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTasks.ts: Contains hooks to fetch tasks by status or fetch a single task by ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useTerritories.ts: Fetches all territories using an actor‑backed React Query hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useTerritory.ts: Supplies hooks for retrieving, updating, deleting, and marking territories returned or available with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useTerritoryNotes.ts: Implements CRUD hooks for territory notes scoped to a territory ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useTrainedConductor.t: Offers hooks to fetch, update notes for, and delete a single trained conductor with cache updates.
Provides a hook to retrieve all trained service meeting conductors.
Defines a hook for fetching all trained publishers.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateCheckoutReco: Mutation hook to modify a territory checkout record and refresh related territory queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateGlobalNote.t: Mutation hook to update a global note and invalidate the global notes list.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateGroupVisit.t: Provides a mutation to update a group visit and invalidates related group visit queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdatePioneer.ts: Defines a mutation for editing a pioneer and refreshes the pioneers list and profile queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdatePublisher.ts: Updates a publisher's details and privileges, then invalidates the publishers list query.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateTask.ts: Supplies a mutation to update a task and triggers refetch of all tasks.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateTaskCompleti: Allows updating a task's completion status and refreshes all task queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateTrainedCondu: Handles updating trained conductor data, invalidates related queries, and shows a success toast.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateTrainedPubli: Updates a trained publisher and their S-148 status, refreshes list data, and handles toast notifications.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and extensive color variables for light and dark modes with utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ComingSoon.tsx: Renders a placeholder page indicating a feature is under development.
frontend/src/pages/ConductorProfile.tsx: Displays and manages a trained conductor's profile with notes editing and delete actions.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Computes and displays congregation statistics, recent activity, and task/territory statuses on the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/FieldServiceGroupProf: Displays details for a specific field service group, including publishers, overseer/assistant info, and visit history with options to add, edit, or delete visits.
frontend/src/pages/FieldServiceGroups.ts: Lists all field service groups with overseer, assistant, and active publishers, linking to each group's profile page.
frontend/src/pages/GroupVisitProfile.tsx: Shows details for a single group visit with publisher mapping, notes, and editing or deletion options, validating group association.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Provides a login screen using Internet Identity with a branded layout and loading state.
frontend/src/pages/Notes.tsx: Manages global notes with category filtering, creation, editing, deletion, and publisher name mapping.
frontend/src/pages/PioneerProfile.tsx: Displays and manages a pioneer's profile, including monthly hours, inline editing, statistics, and modals for editing or deleting records.
frontend/src/pages/Pioneers.tsx: Page that lists pioneers, supports sorting by publisher name, and provides add, edit, and delete modals.
frontend/src/pages/PublicWitnessing.tsx: Displays trained publishers with sorting, status badges, and edit/delete actions, plus a modal to add or modify entries.
frontend/src/pages/PublisherProfile.tsx: Shows a single publisher’s details with privilege badges and provides edit and delete functionality.
frontend/src/pages/Publishers.tsx: Lists publishers with search, group, and activity filters, and includes add, edit, and delete workflows.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceMeetingConduct: Manages trained conductors with alphabetical sorting, availability display, and add, edit, and delete dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/Shepherding.tsx: Lists shepherding visits with search, sorting, and actions to view, edit, record, or delete visits.
frontend/src/pages/ShepherdingVisitProfi: Displays a single shepherding visit with editable notes and options to edit or delete the record.
frontend/src/pages/Tasks.tsx: Shows tasks with filtering, completion toggling, and dialogs for adding, editing, and deleting tasks.
frontend/src/pages/Territories.tsx: Displays all territories with status, publisher info, and check-out duration, plus the option to add territories.
frontend/src/pages/TerritoryProfile.tsx: Shows detailed territory info with edit, delete, check-out, return, and checkout-history management actions.
frontend/src/pages/UserProfile.tsx: User profile page with editable full name and congregation fields, including save and cancel logic tied to profile hooks.
frontend/src/utils/formatters.ts: Collection of timestamp formatting helpers converting bigint timestamps (seconds or nanoseconds) into readable date strings.
frontend/src/utils/groupVisitNotes.ts: Parses a combined notes string into structured fields for discussion topics, overseer notes, assistant notes, and next visit date.
frontend/src/utils/serviceYear.ts: Computes the current service year string based on the date, using a September–August cycle.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with custom colors, animations, radius values, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking requirements to add a Publisher column to the Territories table based on the most recent checkout.
